metadata.title: CVE-2020-25652 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the spice-vdagentd daemon, where it did not properlyhandle client connections that can be established via the UNIX domainsocket in `/run/spice-vdagentd/spice-vdagent-sock`. Any unprivileged localguest user could use this flaw to prevent legitimate agents from connectingto the spice-vdagentd daemon, resulting in a denial of service. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to system availability. This flaw affectsspice-vdagent versions 0.20 and prior.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25652` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spice-vdagent - 0.20.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1ubuntu0.1').
